Package: sk.hax.software.os

[Java] Interface SyncChannel

      • sk.hax.software.os.SyncChannel
      • All Superinterfaces:
        Callbackable, OutboundChannel

        Represents a data communication channel. Can be used to publish outgoing data wrapped in a datagram. Can be used for synchronously receiving data. Can be used to synchronously communicate through the network

        Authors:
        mio

        • Methods Summary

            Methods 
            Type Name and description
            Datagram query(Datagram input, long timeout)
            Send the specified datagram through the underlying channel and expect a single response.
            Datagram receive(long timeout)
            Synchronously receive data from the channel.
            void reset()
            Reset the internal buffer of the channel.
            java.util.List<Datagram> send(Datagram input, long timeout)
            Send the specified datagram through the underlying channel and expect multiple responses.

        • Inherited Methods Summary

            Inherited Methods 
            Methods inherited from class Name
            interface OutboundChannel close, getSourcePort, publish
            interface Callbackable callback

        • Method Detail

          • public Datagram query(Datagram input, long timeout)

            Send the specified datagram through the underlying channel and expect a single response. If the receive of the response times out, null is returned.

            Parameters:
            input - request datagram to publish to the underlying channel
            timeout - maximum milliseconds to wait for the response datagram
            Returns:
            the response datagram, null if a timeout occurs

          • public Datagram receive(long timeout)

            Synchronously receive data from the channel. This method blocks for the specified amount of milliseconds if no data is available. If the timeout is reached, it returns null.

            Parameters:
            timeout - amount of milliseconds to wait for incoming data
            Returns:
            data received by the channel, or null if a timeout occurs

          • public void reset()

            Reset the internal buffer of the channel. This method drops all data that the channel received and was not consumed by a client.

          • public java.util.List<Datagram> send(Datagram input, long timeout)

            Send the specified datagram through the underlying channel and expect multiple responses. The method keeps receiving datagrams in response to the request until a receive times out.

            Parameters:
            input - request datagram to publish to the underlying channel
            timeout - maximum milliseconds to wait for each response datagram
            Returns:
            list of collected response datagrams, empty if no response was received
